DESCRIPTION: #g3: Gain 1 #yStrength, #yDexterity, and #yFocus. NL #g5: Unlock the #yMasterpiece effect of all current sets.
#r1: Take #b50% more damage. NL #r2: Take #b100% more damage. NL #r3: Take #b150% more damage.
#p3: Gain 1 #yStrength. NL #p5: Gain 2 #yStrength. NL NL [#ff8000]Masterpiece NL [#ff8000]8: [#ff8000]Gain [#ff8000]4 [#ff8000]Strength.
#g3: Once every two turns, #yEvoking channels a #yFrost orb. NL #g5: At the start of your turn, #yEvoke an orb. NL #gMasterpiece #g6: Gain #b1 #yFocus.
#g2: #yChannel a #yMeteor at the start of combat. NL #g5: #yChannel a #yMeteor every 3 turns. NL #gMasterpiece #g6: Gain #b1 #yFocus.
#g3: Gain #yBuffer at the start of combat.

#g3: Your first attack each turn #yWounds the target for half its damage. NL #g4: Your first attack each turn #yWounds the target for full damage. NL #gMasterpiece #g6: Your #yWounding attacks deal #b20% more damage.
#g2: Channel a #yFortress at the start of each turn. NL #g5: Channel #b2 #yFortress at the start of each turn. NL #gMasterpiece #g6: Gain #b2 #yDexterity.

#g2: Until you take unblocked damage, heal ALL players for #b2 HP at the end of your turn. NL #g5: The heal also provides #b3 #yVigor. NL #gMasterpiece #g6: The heal grants #b3 more #yVigor and #b3 #yBlock.

#g3: Inflict #b25% of the first damage you take each turn to the attacker as #yRevenge. NL #g5: The #yRevenge applied becomes #b50%. NL #gMasterpiece #g6: Also gain [E] the turn after you take unblocked damage.
#g1: Whenever you would gain #yStrength or #yDexterity in combat, gain the other instead.
#gIncreases a #ySet #yEffect on pickup, and #rdecreases it when removed. The last effect of each #ySet is only available if you complete the #yMasterpiece set. Starts combat #yExhausted.
#yEvoke: Randomly deal #b1 damage #b1 time.
An ally #yRevives at #b1 #gHP. At the end of combat or after taking enough damage, they #rdie. The source of the effect will take ALL damage they would have taken.
The source will take some of the damage the owner would have taken. If they're dead, they #yRevive with #b2 #yShallow #yGrave instead.
#yFatal #yAttacks by #pGrim #pReaper or allies with their #yShroud collect #b1 #pSoul. During combat only, increase your #gMax #gHP (but #rnot current HP) equal to twice your #pSouls.
When the target dies, deal damage equal to its #yMax #yHP to ALL enemies.
Any player currently revived in a zombie/ghost state is #yHalf-Dead.
At #b100 #yMana, #yUnknown #yKing will #pReassemble #pHis #pSword for the rest of that combat.
At #b100 #yFlame #ySpirits, enter #yCombustion. After #yLiving #yArmor's swap, if ANY player is in #yCombustion ALL players will enter #yCombustion.

Exit this #yStance after playing a card, inflicting #yBurn randomly and another effect based on its type: NL NL #yAttacks deal their damage randomly as non-attack damage. NL #ySkills gain [E] and #b25 #yFlame #ySpirits. NL #yPowers enter #yCalm and draw a card.
Deal #b2 damage to ALL characters. #yUnblocked damage on enemies becomes #yBlock while #yUnblocked damage on allies becomes #yVigor.
#yComrades that have been #yOrdered #b3 or more times.
At #b8 #yRanks, add a #yComrade #ySystem to your hand.
Orbs that are only triggered by #yOrders. When #yOrdered, they gain #b+1 to stats before becoming #pVeteran at #b3 times.
Trigger the #yOrder effect of all of your current #yComrades.
At #b10 #yConcoct, create an #yExperimentation in your hand.
#yPotions that can be used on allies or enemies to varying effects.
Transfers a portion of an enemy's HP to a new enemy. That enemy cannot die until the #yGrave dies.
#yOrbs with limited lifespans extended by enemy deaths. Their effects scale #rexclusively based on your #yLament.
Dictates the effects of your #yGreat #yTragedies, decays by half at the end of the turn if no enemies died recently.
#rReplaces your #yAttack damage with #b1 #yAttack damage, unaffacted by #yFocus.
#yDead, #yShrouded, below #b10% HP, at #b1 HP, or below #b13 #yMaximum HP.
The #yShroud's owner is revived and immune to damage. The source of #yShroud will take #b100% more damage per #yShroud they provide, but receive those targets' #yBlock..
At #b15 #yEmbrace, add a #ySoul #yContract to ALL allies' hands.
The #yhighest #yHP enemy in the room, they'll be marked with a #rblade above their intent.
